broadcasts.title: Alumni Meet 2025 - Save the Date
broadcasts.body:
Dear Alumni,

We are excited to announce our annual Alumni Meet 2025 scheduled for October 10th, 2025. This year's theme is 'Innovation and Growth: Shaping Tomorrow Together'.

Event Details:
- Date: October 10, 2025
- Time: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Venue: Main Campus Auditorium
- Dress Code: Business Casual

The event will feature:
✓ Keynote speeches from distinguished alumni
✓ Panel discussions on industry trends
✓ Networking sessions
✓ Cultural performances
✓ Awards ceremony
✓ Gala dinner

Registration opens soon. Stay tuned for more details!

Best regards,
Alumni Relations Team

broadcasts.title: Career Guidance Session - Tech Industry
broadcasts.body:
Hello Recent Graduates!

Join us for an exclusive career guidance session focused on the technology industry. Our panel of successful alumni will share insights about:

• Breaking into tech companies
• Essential skills for 2025
• Salary negotiation tips
• Work-life balance in tech
• Remote work opportunities

Session Details:
- Date: October 5, 2025
- Time: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM
- Format: Virtual (Zoom link will be shared)

Panelists include:
- Sarah Chen, Senior Engineer at Google
- Raj Patel, Product Manager at Microsoft
- Maya Singh, CTO at TechStartup Inc.

Limited seats available. Register now!

Questions? Reply to this message.

Cheers,
Career Services Team

broadcasts.title: Mentorship Program Launch
broadcasts.body:
Dear Alumni Community,

We're thrilled to launch our new Alumni Mentorship Program connecting experienced alumni with recent graduates and current students.

Program Highlights:
• One-on-one mentoring relationships
• Monthly virtual meetups
• Industry-specific guidance
• Career development workshops
• Networking opportunities

How to participate:
1. Fill out the mentor/mentee application
2. Attend the orientation session
3. Get matched with your mentor/mentee
4. Begin your mentoring journey

Orientation Session:
- Date: September 30, 2025
- Time: 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM
- Venue: Virtual

Together, we can build a stronger alumni community!

Warm regards,
Alumni Mentorship Team
